title: OhSoft OCam v405.0 Final + Patch - [SH]
description: oCam is a useful application designed to help users record or capture their desktop screen.oCam is also able to capture the sounds currently playing on your computer. The mouse cursor can be included in the output recording. oCam Screen Recorder allows you to record as well and sound accompaniment, not only through the microphone. Feature of the program is straightforward record any sounds played through the speakers in the recording process. This applies to technology WASAPI the loopback address, at which capture the sounds emitted by the system (what we hear) without the use of a stereo mix
